DOC.brief_summary: This first-in-human , open-label , dose escalation study evaluate safety tolerability AM0010 patient advance solid tumor , dose daily subcutaneously monotherapy combination chemotherapy immunotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study AM0010 Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Part A Escalation Cohorts : Histologically cytologically confirm advanced malignant solid tumor , limited melanoma , castrate resistant prostate cancer ( CRPC ) , ovarian cancer ( OVCA ) , renal cell carcinoma , colorectal carcinoma ( CRC ) , pancreatic carcinoma nonsmall cell lung carcinoma ( NSCLC ) refractory , intolerant , standard therapy available patient refuse exist therapy Part A Expansion Cohorts , Part B C Escalation Expansion Cohorts : Tumors histological diagnosis tissue origin may enrol Patients must fail prior standard curative chemotherapy disease , refuse exist therapy OR propose chemotherapy regimen AM0010 add represent acceptable standard treatment disease . Measurable evaluable disease accord irRC bone metastatic disease evaluable Prostate Cancer Working Group 2 criterion ( PCWG2 ) castrationresistant prostate cancer ( CRPC ) At least 18 year age Performance Status 0 1 Adequate organ function Hematologic malignancy Pregnant lactate Present history neurological disorder Multiple Sclerosis Guillain Barre inflammatory central nervous system/peripheral nervous system ( CNS/PNS ) disorder Myocardial infarction within last 6 month Unstable angina , unstable cardiac arrhythmia require medication Surgery within last 28 day Systemic fungal , bacterial , viral , infection History bleeding diathesis within last 6 month Positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis C , hepatitis B
